website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you are looking for a unisex wetsuit jacket for sharing or non-gendered styling.
pros: Neoprene material keeps wearers particularly warm and comfortable
Stitching does not irritate the skin
Comes with a nylon option if looking for a lightweight jacket
cons: Many customers had issues with the company's sizing chart

customer_reviews.title: Super warm for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I love this warm and comfortable jacket for water aerobics! I typically wear a large, but read the previous reviews to buy a size larger than you normally wear and it fits perfect. I would highly recommend this jacket to anyone who is in the water when the weather is cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice layer for SCUBA diving
customer_reviews.text: I am going on a very cool diving trip to the Socorro islands and already own a 3 mil wetsuit which I love. I decide to rather then buy a 5 mil suit to buy this jacket to wear on the trip. I will report back after the trip. I is snug like it should be OVER my wetsuit and feel I will stay nice and warm with 6 mil of wetsuit on my upper body. I am glad I got the medium as the large would be too big. I am a 5'7'' woman weighing about 135 pounds with longe legs and arms. I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Debtheweb

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but tight under arms
customer_reviews.text: I bought the all neoprene. It is very well made, and reasonably priced. However, the underarm is cut quite high, and but wide. I am a 5'4" tall woman, and bought XL. I wear a size 14, and it fit pretty well considering it is unisex, other than the underarm. I would imagine it might be tight for a man with broad shoulders. I decided to return it for the Lycra sleeve, which should be more comfortable and allow more freedom of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep you warm in the water
customer_reviews.text: This is the second jacket I purchased in the year . the first one seem to fit a little bit better and a little bit warmer. But I am still very satisfied with this product. It does run small. Good material and easy to take care of you wear it and just simply let it drip dry and there is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen Fant

customer_reviews.title: This was an obviously used item,
customer_reviews.text: This was an obviously used item, with a big rip in the torso fabric on one side. Inside labels were faded and wrinkled as had been used. We received a replacement which was in perfect new condition. Probably a quality control problem. Would hope it is not a policy to ship used items to new customers. Replacement item is nice, fits well and feels great when swimming. Runs a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Internationalgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wet suit top!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and try to exercise in the pool every day. This helps me when the temperature dips. It keeps me warm but not too warm, very comfortable and easy to get on and off. It seems well made though I haven't worn it too many times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Shoshana

customer_reviews.title: warm well fitting and of course cute
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2' 125 lbs the small jacket fits perfectly snug as it should. It feels warm but won't know until I get in the water. Well made can't wait to go diving. This is a dive shop quality wet suit jacket w/o the price couldn't dive, but the jacket was warm while snorkeling. I usually wear a skin full and full wet suit. Now I wil will wear a skin shorty wetsuit and the jacket. Great fit and it will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY

customer_reviews.title: The jacket look like a medium and I ordered an xl for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made jacket and the materials are not cheap. The jacket look like a medium and I ordered an xl for my husband who has a big belly and it fit very well, of course I needed to help him zip it up. He said it had a female zipper( whatever that means) but once on it looked very nice. I’m very happy with this purchase and can’t wait to go in the water
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly during my open water scuba training and kept me from getting sun burnt! :-)
customer_reviews.author: The Lani

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as pictured. Very stylish and sharp looking.I’m 5ft 3 1/2” -size 16, with a 41waist,42 bust-got an 2XL and the fit is ok-sleeves a bit long but can fold up. I could try an XL but this seems fine-snug but not too tight. Neoprene sleeves feel a bit heavy for swimming so might consider the Lycra sleeve next time with neoprene body.This should be great to stay warm in the pool in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The company was excellent at returns
customer_reviews.text: had to return it because of issues with the sizing. The company was excellent at returns. I am sorry to return it. The jacket itself is beautiful and made very well. Since my cancer and breast reduction many items don't fit me. One area has been reduce I just need to work on the others.
customer_reviews.author: towboater

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FIT AND LOOK BUT NOT FOR COLD WATER
customer_reviews.text: Not as warn as I would have liked buy it fits well. The neck line doesn't quite protect, but then again, I'm using this for cool water surfing in Florida winter as opposed to kayak
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on and loved it. Fit great and was good quality. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: This Is Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: Very thick material, easy on; I like the colors. Surprised at the loose fit arms, not snug at all like my other wetsuit tops.
customer_reviews.author: WVU Alumnus in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small. Size chart is not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Well made but size chart was WAY off. I was a “medium” by the chart, however, a “large” was too small. The jacket and sleeve length were 2 “ too short. It would be a good buy if it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Henry B.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves slid down past elbows, fit fine in the chest.
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves slid down arms past the elbows when using it. Fit fine in the chest. Returned item in favor of another brand that the sleeves did not slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla owner since 2012

customer_reviews.title: WAAAAY to small for the size it said it was
customer_reviews.text: Came up 2 inches short on the wrists and had trouble zipping it up as it was so tight. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Because I am always cold in the ocean. With a jacket like this, it keeps me warm. I like that it is not all black like many wet suits. Good price for wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Erice

customer_reviews.title: Cute jacket for short women
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 foot tall. The length of jacket and sleeve was good so might not be for a taller person.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: loved this
customer_reviews.text: I am typically a women's size 8 and bought a medium. Everything about this item was perfect,. It fit beautifully and was comfortable. It kept my core warm and I didn't even feel it on my arms. Very flattering fit. I would love to order another one if they only had more color variety.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for Girl too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket with Lycra sleeves and neoprene in the vest area. Order size larger than expected. Sleeves good length for a girl like me, but may be short on a guy.
customer_reviews.author: Bon D

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is just right when you need a light cover, either for sunscreen or warmth when the water or air is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, worked great on our last jet ski journey on Lake Michigan :)
customer_reviews.author: bluetn

customer_reviews.title: Good insulation
customer_reviews.text: Small sized! Had to buy the biggest size, so the sleeves are too long. No options for sleeve length. This isn't a problem. Good insulation for pool aquaerobics on cool, windy days in Puerto Rico
customer_reviews.author: Mely

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The top fits as expected and feels very good against your skin. Keeps you warm in cold water. Perfect for kite surfing
customer_reviews.author: YM

customer_reviews.title: good quality, nice fit
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly was I wanted and worked just fine for me. I'm 5'6" 150 lbs and the large size fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are rashguard not wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves are not wetsuit material. The sleeves are just thin rash guard material. If it said it in the description, then I missed it. I just looked at picture
customer_reviews.author: T Matthews

customer_reviews.title: This is great for when the weather is getting chilly on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when the weather is getting chilly on the jet ski -Nice fitting, however I watched the reviews, I thought it fit to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, I wish the sleeves were neoprene as ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, I wish the sleeves were neoprene as well. I thought it was. I wear it in mild weather.
customer_reviews.author: G.ZEE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too confining for the purpose - keeping warm in cool air aqua aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Carignan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Bought 1 size up & fits great ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Bought 1 size up & fits great except the sleeves are a little long, but easy enough to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Xuan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, dissappoited
customer_reviews.text: The arms are not neoprene some sort of nylon cloth. Makes your arms cold just putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Cbiez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold weather water aerobics!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the jacket very much. It was too large for me and they did not have the size I needed so that I could exchange it. I would certainly buy it again if they had my size.
customer_reviews.author: Emmagram

customer_reviews.title: Sizes vary based on the thickness of the material
customer_reviews.text: Went from 2XL to 3XL and the fit is much better. Use it for swim instruction in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & it definitely keeps me warm in the pool for water volleyball games!
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: The Wetsuit runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: Great Wetsuit. You must be sure to order the correct size. They run on the small size.
customer_reviews.author: gary adelman

customer_reviews.title: Fit is poor
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is way off. Looks like you need to order 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, snug, and nice. Got this for canyoneering and it works great. Fantastic value
customer_reviews.author: Dave Anthony, CFP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, sleeves are to short. You get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit by following the chart measurements. Jet skiing in 60 degree water, 55 degree outside temperature for hours without a bit of chill.
customer_reviews.author: The Bears

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The product was not quite as I expected size Xxl was still too small More suited to women than men
customer_reviews.author: sean marrow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and feel...does float up a not if outside of pants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it fit as I did like
customer_reviews.text: runs small large normally fits but this runs small. Have to return. Wish it fit as I did like it
customer_reviews.author: Juie D

product_meta.title: NATYFLY Wetsuit Jacket Long Sleeve Neoprene Wetsuits Top for Men/Women
feature_bullets: 1. Two sleeves types, Neoprene sleeve and Nylon Lycra sleeve. Neoprene sleeve, good heat preservation will make you warm in cold water. Nylon Lycra long sleeves,more soft light, make you flexible in the water.

2. The color is Blue-Lycra jacket with Nylon sleeves, main part is made of 2mm thick highly quality neoprene, warm and comfortable. The printing part is nylon Lycra material, nylon Sleeves provide more flexibility in swim or surf.
3. The color is Blue-Neoprene jacket with neoprene sleeves, all part is made of 3mm thick highly quality neoprene, warm and comfortable. Neoprene sleeves can keep you warm in cold conditions.

4. Flatlock stitching throughout to reduce seam irritation and ensure maximum comfort and durability. Bright geometric printing, dynamic and unique ,hope you like it! Strengthened YKK front zipper is designed to allow for easy entry and exit.
5. Please Note: Size chart is only for reference, please choose the best size after measuring your Chest/Waist and other data.
